global_attributes: Conventions CF-1.6 title RADS 4.0 pass file institution Altimetrics / NOAA / TU Delft source radar altimeter references RADS Data Manual, Issue 4.0

var.name: sla
var.data: alt range SUB dry_tropo SUB wet_tropo SUB iono SUB inv_bar SUB tide_solid SUB tide_ocean SUB tide_load SUB tide_pole SUB ssb SUB mss SUB ref_frame_offset SUB

quality_flag.sat: e1 e2 g1 j1 j2 n1 tx

var.comment: Sea level determined from satellite altitude - range - all altimetric corrections

var.name: time
var.comment: UTC time of measurement. Attribute leap_second gives time of leap second if any occurs during the data set

var.name: time_rel_eq
var.comment: UTC time relative to the equator crossing (negative is before, positive is after)

var.name: time_local_solar
var.comment: Local solar time (in seconds) since start of the solar day

var.name: time_ymdhms
var.comment: UTC time formatted as yymmddhhmmss

var.name: time_mjd
var.comment: UTC time of measurement expressed in Modified Julian Days

var.name: time_2000
var.comment: UTC time of measurement

var.name: time_1950
var.comment: UTC time of measurement

var.name: lat
var.comment: Positive latitude is North latitude, negative latitude is South latitude

var.name: lon
var.comment: East longitude relative to Greenwich meridian

var.name: alt_jgm3
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_dgme04
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_gfz
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_cnes
var.sat: e1 e2 c2 n1 pn tx
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_eiggc03c
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_pgs7777
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_ggm02c_itrf2005
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_eiggl04s
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_gdrcp
var.sat: gs g1 j1 j2 n1 pn tx
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_gps
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_eig6c
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_gdrd
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_reaper
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_reaper_deos
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_reaper_gfz
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_reaper_esoc
var.comment: Altitude of satellite above the TOPEX reference ellipsoid

var.name: alt_rate
var.comment: The reference surface for the orbital altitude rate is MSS

var.name: range_ka
var.long_name: Ka-band range corrected for instr. effects

var.name: range_ku
var.long_name: Ku-band range corrected for instr. effects

var.name: range_c
var.long_name: C-band range corrected for instr. effects

var.name: range_s
var.long_name: S-band range corrected for instr. effects

var.name: range_ku_mle3
var.long_name: Ku-band range corrected for instr. effects (MLE3)

var.name: dry_tropo_ecmwf
var.comment: A dry tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for dry troposphere delays

var.name: dry_tropo_ncep
var.comment: A dry tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for dry troposphere delays

var.name: dry_tropo_era
var.comment: A dry tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for dry troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_rad
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_ecmwf
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_ncep
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_nvap
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_tovs_ssmi
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_tovs_ncep
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_era
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: wet_tropo_rad_enh
var.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added to range to correct for wet troposphere delays

var.name: iono_alt
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_bent
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_alt_smooth
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_doris
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_gim
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_iri2007
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_nic09
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_alt_mle3
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: iono_alt_smooth_mle3
var.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added to range to correct for ionosphere delays

var.name: inv_bar_static
var.comment: Effect of the static atmospheric pressure on sea surface, subtracting global mean

var.name: inv_bar_global
var.comment: Global mean effect of the static atmospheric pressure on sea surface

var.name: inv_bar_mog2d
var.comment: Combined low and high frequency effect of atmospheric pressure and wind on sea surface

var.name: inv_bar_mok2d
var.comment: Scaled version of static IB to match MOG2D

var.name: inv_bar_mog2d_mean
var.long_name: local mean MOG2D dynamic atmospheric correction
var.comment: Long-term temporal mean of the MOG2D dynamic atmospheric correction at measurement location

var.name: tide_solid
var.comment: Calculated using second and third degree constituents, excluding permanent tide

var.name: tide_ocean_fes04
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including equilibrium and non-equilibrium tides

var.name: tide_ocean_webtide
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including equilibrium and non-equilibrium tides

var.name: tide_ocean_got47
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including equilibrium and non-equilibrium tides

var.name: tide_ocean_got48
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including equilibrium and non-equilibrium tides

var.name: tide_ocean_got49
var.comment: Ocean tide variation including equilibrium and non-equilibrium tides

var.name: tide_load_fes04
var.comment: Load tide variation to be added to ocean tide

var.name: tide_load_got47
var.comment: Load tide variation to be added to ocean tide

var.name: tide_load_got48
var.comment: Load tide variation to be added to ocean tide

var.name: tide_load_got49
var.comment: Load tide variation to be added to ocean tide

var.name: tide_pole
var.comment: Variation of absolute sea level due to polar motion

var.name: ssb_bm3
var.sat: c2 e1 e2 g1 gs pn sa tx
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_cls
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_csr
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: ssb_cls_mle3
var.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added to range to correct for sea state delays

var.name: range_rms_ka
var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.name: range_rms_ku
var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.name: range_rms_c
var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.name: range_rms_s
var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.name: range_rms_ku_mle3
var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.name: tb_180
var.comment: Brightness temperatures are unsmoothed

var.name: tb_187
var.comment: Brightness temperatures are unsmoothed

var.name: tb_210
var.comment: Brightness temperatures are unsmoothed

var.name: tb_222
var.comment: Brightness temperatures are unsmoothed

if.sat: e1 e2 j1 j2 n1 sa

var.name: tb_238
var.comment: Brightness temperatures are unsmoothed

var.comment: Brightness temperatures are unsmoothed

var.comment: Brightness temperatures are unsmoothed

var.comment: Brightness temperatures are unsmoothed

var.name: flag_alt_oper_mode
var.sat: c2 j1 j2 n1 pn tx

var.name: qual_attitude
var.sat: g1 gs j1 j2 n1 pn sa tx

var.name: qual_alt_rain_ice
var.sat: g1 j1 j2 n1 pn sa tx

var.name: qual_rad_rain_ice
var.sat: e1 e2 j1 j2 n1 pn tx
var.long_name: corruption of radiometer measurement (rain or ice)

var.name: qual_swh
var.long_name: quality of the wave height estimate

var.name: qual_sig0
var.long_name: quality of the backscatter coefficient estimate

var.name: qual_orbit
var.sat: c2 e1 e2 j1 pn sa

var.name: flags
var.flag_masks: hardware_bad attitude_bad flag_rad_oper_mode alt_iono_bad alt_land alt_non_ocean rad_land alt_rain_or_ice rad_rain_or_ice tb1_bad tb2_bad range_suspect swh_suspect backscatter_suspect tracking_preset orbit_degraded

var.name: flags_mle3
var.flag_masks: hardware_bad attitude_bad flag_rad_oper_mode alt_iono_bad alt_land alt_non_ocean rad_land alt_rain_or_ice rad_rain_or_ice tb1_bad tb2_bad range_suspect swh_suspect backscatter_suspect tracking_preset orbit_degraded

var.comment: Range bias already added to range

var.comment: Range bias already added to range

var.comment: Range bias already added to range

var.name: drange_dat
var.comment: Range bias already added to range

var.long_name: normalized std dev of significant wave height

var.long_name: std dev of Ka-band significant wave height
var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.long_name: std dev of Ku-band significant wave height
var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.name: swh_rms_ku_mle3

var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.name: sig0_rms_norm
var.long_name: normalized std dev of backscatter coefficient

var.name: sig0_rms_ka
var.long_name: std dev of Ka-band backscatter coefficient
var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.name: sig0_rms_ku
var.long_name: std dev of Ku-band backscatter coefficient
var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.comment: Based on valid high-rate measurements

var.name: off_nadir_angle2_wf_ka
var.long_name: off-nadir pointing angle squared from waveform

var.name: off_nadir_angle2_wf_ku
var.long_name: off-nadir pointing angle squared from waveform

var.name: off_nadir_angle2_pf
var.long_name: off-nadir pointing angle squared from platform

var.name: off_nadir_angle2_wf_rms_ku
var.long_name: std dev of off-nadir pointing angle squared from waveform

var.name: dswh_ku
var.comment: Bias already added to significant wave height

var.name: dswh_c
var.comment: Bias already added to significant wave height

var.long_name: Ku-band significant wave height correction due to SWH/attitude

var.comment: Bias already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_c
var.comment: Bias already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_atmos_ka
var.long_name: Ka-band backscatter coefficient correction due to atmosphere/attitude
var.comment: Bias already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_atmos_ku
var.sat: e1 e2 j1 j2 n1 pn tx
var.long_name: Ku-band backscatter coefficient correction due to atmosphere/attitude
var.comment: Bias already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_atmos_c
var.long_name: C-band backscatter coefficient correction due to atmosphere/attitude
var.comment: Bias already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_atmos_s

var.comment: Bias already added to backscatter coefficient

var.long_name: backscatter coefficient correction due to SWH/attitude
var.comment: Bias already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_range
var.long_name: backscatter coefficient correction due to range
var.comment: Bias already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: dsig0_temp
var.long_name: backscatter coefficient correction due to temperature
var.comment: Bias already added to backscatter coefficient

var.name: liquid_water
var.sat: e1 e2 j1 j2 n1 pn sa tx

var.name: noise_floor_rms_ku
var.long_name: std dev of Ku-band noise floor of waveforms

var.name: dry_tropo_airtide
var.long_name: air tide correction to the dry tropospheric correction
var.comment: Add to dry tropospheric correction to account for missing S1 and S2 tidal signal

var.name: mss_annual
var.long_name: annual variation of mean sea level
var.comment: Annual variation of sea level with respect to long-term mean sea level

var.name: gia
var.comment: Change of land elevation relative to geoid due to GIA since 1 Jan 2000

var.name: first_meas_time
var.long_name: time of first measurement in pass

var.name: last_meas_time
var.long_name: time of last measurement in pass
